title: Summoner Wars
subtitle: Conquer the Battlefields of Itharia
description: Summoner Wars is a fast-paced, tactical 2-player game. Players take on the role of Summoners, leading their faction to conquer the war-torn world of Itharia through the power of mysterious Summoning Stones.

factionSelection.title: Choose Your Faction
factionSelection.subtitle: Each summoner commands a unique army and tactics

tutorial.title: Summoner Wars Tutorial
tutorial.welcome: Welcome to Summoner Wars! In this game, you will play as a powerful Summoner, commanding your army to conquer the battlefield.

steps.setup: Preparing the tutorial match. Both sides will use the Fallen Kingdom (Necromancer) faction...
steps.welcome:
Welcome to Summoner Wars!

You will play as the Necromancer "Ret-Talus", commanding an undead army to defeat the opposing Summoner.

Destroy the enemy Summoner to win!
steps.boardOverview:
This is the battlefield ‚Äî an 8√ó6 grid. Your units are at the bottom, your opponent's at the top.

Your Summoner, starting units, and gate are already placed on the board.
steps.summonerIntro:
Your Summoner "Ret-Talus" is your most important unit.

He has 12 Life, 2 Strength, and is a ranged attacker (range 3).

He also has a unique ability "Revive Undead" ‚Äî we'll learn how to use it shortly.
steps.magicIntro:
This is your Magic bar. Magic is used to summon units, build structures, and cast event cards.

The first player starts with 2 Magic, the second with 3.
steps.phaseIntro:
Each turn has 6 phases in order:

1. Summon ‚Üí 2. Move ‚Üí 3. Build ‚Üí 4. Attack ‚Üí 5. Magic ‚Üí 6. Draw

You are currently in the Summon phase.
steps.handIntro:
This is your hand area. You can summon units, build structures, or cast event cards from your hand.

There's no hand limit. You draw up to 5 cards at the end of each turn.
steps.summonExplain:
During the Summon phase, you can summon any number of units from your hand.

Summon rules:
‚Ä¢ Pay the magic cost shown on the unit card
‚Ä¢ Place the unit on an empty space adjacent to a gate you control

Now, select a unit card from your hand and click an empty space next to your gate.
steps.summonAction:
Select a unit card from your hand, then click a highlighted space next to your gate to summon it.

Tip: Click a unit card in your hand to select it, then click a highlighted space to place it.
steps.abilityExplain:
Great! Now let's learn about Summoner abilities.

Your Summoner "Ret-Talus" has the "Revive Undead" ability:
Once per turn during the Summon phase, deal 2 damage to this unit to take an Undead unit from your discard pile and place it adjacent to this unit.

This powerful ability keeps your undead army coming back!
steps.abilityAction:
Now use the "Revive Undead" ability!

Click your Summoner to activate the ability, then select an Undead unit from your discard pile and place it adjacent to your Summoner.

Note: This ability deals 2 damage to your Summoner.
steps.endSummon: Summoning complete! Click "End Phase" to move to the Move phase.
steps.moveExplain:
Now it's the Move phase.

Movement rules:
‚Ä¢ Move up to 3 different units
‚Ä¢ Each unit moves up to 2 spaces
‚Ä¢ Only horizontal or vertical ‚Äî no diagonal movement
‚Ä¢ Cannot move through other cards
‚Ä¢ Structures cannot move
steps.moveAction:
Select a unit and move it.

Click your unit to select it, then click a highlighted target space to move.
steps.endMove: Movement done! You can move more units (up to 3 total), or click "End Phase" to enter the Build phase.
steps.buildExplain:
Now it's the Build phase.

You can build gates or structures from your hand:
‚Ä¢ Pay the build cost
‚Ä¢ Place adjacent to your Summoner or in your back 3 rows

Gates are important ‚Äî you can only summon units next to gates!
steps.buildAction:
If you have a Portal (gate) in hand, you can build it.

Or click "End Phase" to skip building.
steps.attackExplain:
Now it's the Attack phase!

Attack rules:
‚Ä¢ Attack with up to 3 different units
‚Ä¢ Melee units (‚öîÔ∏è) attack adjacent targets
‚Ä¢ Ranged units (üèπ) attack targets up to 3 spaces in a straight line
‚Ä¢ Roll dice equal to Strength; matching attack type faces deal damage

Warning: If you don't attack any enemy unit this phase, your Summoner takes 1 penalty damage!
steps.attackAction:
Select one of your units, then click an enemy unit to attack.

Tip: Click your attacking unit first, then click an enemy target in range.
steps.attackResult:
Attack complete! Dice results determine the number of hits.

Each matching attack type face = 1 damage.
When a unit's damage equals its Life, it's destroyed.

Destroying an enemy unit also grants 1 Magic!
steps.endAttack: You can attack with more units (up to 3 total), or click "End Phase" to enter the Magic phase.
steps.magicExplain:
Now it's the Magic phase.

You can discard any number of cards from your hand. Each discarded card gives you 1 Magic.

Magic is the resource for summoning and casting ‚Äî manage it wisely!
steps.magicAction:
Select cards to discard for Magic, or click "End Phase" to skip.

Tip: Click cards in your hand during the Magic phase to select/deselect them for discard.
steps.drawExplain:
Now it's the Draw phase.

If you have fewer than 5 cards, you automatically draw up to 5.

Note: If your draw pile is empty, you don't reshuffle the discard pile ‚Äî you simply can't draw!
steps.endDraw: Drawing complete! Click "End Phase" to end your turn and pass to your opponent.
steps.opponentTurn:
It's now your opponent's turn. Watch their actions...

They go through the same 6 phases.
steps.inactionPenalty:
Did you notice? The opponent didn't attack any of your units during their Attack phase, so their Summoner took 1 penalty damage.

This is the "Inaction Penalty" ‚Äî it encourages aggressive play!
steps.victoryCondition:
The victory condition is simple:

Destroy the enemy Summoner to win!

Your Summoner is your most important unit. Protect yours while finding ways to defeat theirs.
steps.finish:
Congratulations on completing the Summoner Wars tutorial!

You've learned:
‚Ä¢ The 6-phase turn structure
‚Ä¢ Basic summoning, movement, and combat
‚Ä¢ The Summoner ability "Revive Undead"
‚Ä¢ Magic management and card draw
‚Ä¢ The Inaction Penalty rule

Now go challenge a real opponent!

hint.summon: Summon units from hand adjacent to gates
hint.move: Move up to 3 units, each up to 2 spaces
hint.build: Build gates or structures in your back rows
